subject: Self Care
title: Sleep and Mental Health
description: Learn Sleep and Mental Health in one minute.

hook.text: One night of poor sleep increases anxiety by 30%. Two bad nights and irritability becomes the default.

buildup.text: REM sleep processes emotions. Without it, the amygdala overreacts to even minor negative stimuli.

discovery.text: Insomnia doubles the risk of depression. Poor sleep is both a symptom and a cause of mood disorders.

twist.text: Improving sleep alone has been shown to reduce symptoms of anxiety and depression significantly.

climax.text: Sleep is not separate from mental health. It is the foundation everything emotional is built upon.

punchline.text: Fix the sleep. Watch the mood follow.

quiz.question: How does poor sleep affect the amygdala?
options: The amygdala overreacts to minor negative stimuli
